content: a cute hat that ll keep your ears warm knits up quickly in cosy chunky yarn the double moss stitch band is worked flat then you join in the round for the stockinette crown short row shaping is added for a better fit keeping your ears cosy the hat is finished with a simple crochet edging and a pom pom yarn quince and co puffin one skein = 112 yards/102 metres needles one 6 5mm/us 10½ 100cm/40 circular needle plus four 6 5mm/us 10½ double pointed needles if not using magic loop method one 6 5mm/us 10½ crochet hook gauge 12 stitches = 4 in stocking stitch using 6 5mm/us 10½ needles dimensions to fit an average ladies head about 22 around
